subject: Re: [junit] Recompiling and reloading from GUITestRunner
msgSnippet: ... Well, yes, but you ll have to write that yourself. :) Why do you want the TestRunner to be an IDE, though? Single Responsibility Principle and all that. --
messageBody:
Chris Morris wrote:
> Is there a way to get the swingui.TestRunner to also recompile the test
> class it's running upon clicking the run button?

Well, yes, but you'll have to write that yourself. :)

Why do you want the TestRunner to be an IDE, though? Single
Responsibility Principle and all that.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
